text: Dominick Salvatore (born 1940) is an American economist, currently Distinguished Professor at Fordham University, an Honorary Professor at Shanghai Finance University, Hunan University, and University of Pretoria, Director of the Global Economic Policy Center and a Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science and New York Academy of Sciences. He is the author of "International Economics". ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:21st-century American economists Category:City College of New York alumni Category:City University of New York alumni Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Fordham University faculty
title: Dominick Salvatore
